data.price: 139. Dan janganlah kamu (merasa) lemah, dan jangan (pula) bersedih hati, sebab kamu paling tinggi (derajatnya), jika kamu orang beriman.
data.arabic: وَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَلَا تَحۡزَنُواْ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

meta.transliteration: walā tahinū walā taḥzanū wa-antumu al-aʿlawna in kuntum mu'minīna

dua.name: Dua for Resilience
dua.significanceReason: Encourages believers to maintain hope, strength, and emotional resilience during challenging times. Promotes psychological and spiritual endurance.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
